categories.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: Cut to Toph staring after Sokka with her hands to her sides. Aang had jumped up and now softly lands beside her.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Toph staring after Sokka with her hands to her sides. Aang had jumped up and now softly lands beside her.

paragraphs.body: The next move shows Toph digging through rock with her fingers. The camera pans over and Aang rubs his hands together and tries to do the same thing, but smashes his hand against the rock and grunts in pain.
paragraphs.text: The next move shows Toph digging through rock with her fingers. The camera pans over and Aang rubs his hands together and tries to do the same thing, but smashes his hand against the rock and grunts in pain.

paragraphs.body: During their next session, Toph builds herself into a shield of rock which Aang has to push back over a marked boundary. He is successful. His training begins to move smoothly.
paragraphs.text: During their next session, Toph builds herself into a shield of rock which Aang has to push back over a marked boundary. He is successful. His training begins to move smoothly.

paragraphs.body: During another training session Aang is standing on two pillars of earth tossing a rock into the air while switching hands to catch it each time. Toph walks between the two pillars of earth and uses earthbending to shake the pillars.
paragraphs.text: During another training session Aang is standing on two pillars of earth tossing a rock into the air while switching hands to catch it each time. Toph walks between the two pillars of earth and uses earthbending to shake the pillars.

paragraphs.body: In another part of the canyon, Sokka is looking for food when he stumbles upon an animal.
paragraphs.text: In another part of the canyon, Sokka is looking for food when he stumbles upon an animal.

paragraphs.body: Back at the canyon, Aang's earthbending training continues.
paragraphs.text: Back at the canyon, Aang's earthbending training continues.
